code: import TextManager from'../mechanics/TextManager';export var SET_TEXT_DATA='SET_TEXT_DATA';export var SET_LINK_NODES_DATA='SET_LINK_NODES_DATA';export var SET_CHOICES_DATA='SET_CHOICES_DATA';export var SET_ALL_DATA='SET_ALL_DATA';export var SET_LOADING='SET_LOADING';export var setTextData=function setTextData(data){return{type:SET_TEXT_DATA,data:data};};export var setLinkNodesData=function setLinkNodesData(data){return{type:SET_LINK_NODES_DATA,data:data};};export var setChoicesData=function setChoicesData(data){return{type:SET_CHOICES_DATA,data:data};};export var setAllData=function setAllData(textData,linkNodesData,choicesData){return{type:SET_ALL_DATA,textData:textData,linkNodesData:linkNodesData,choicesData:choicesData};};export var setLoading=function setLoading(loading){return{type:SET_LOADING,loading:loading};};export var loadModuleData=function loadModuleData(moduleNumber){return function(dispatch){return TextManager.loadModuleAsync(moduleNumber).then(function(data){return dispatch(setAllData(data.textData,data.linkNodesData,data.choicesData));});};};
